snippet: Products virtually identical to e-cigarettes are known by names like e-hookahs or vaping pens, thwarting efforts by health officials to track their use, especially among young people.
abstract: Emergence of e-hookahs and other devices like them is frustrating public health officials who are already struggling to measure the spread of e-cigarettes, particularly among young people; products, which are exploding in popularity and are often virtually identical to e-cigarettes, are being shrewdly marketed to avoid the stigma associated with cigarettes of any kind (Series: The New Smoke).
lead_paragraph: Products virtually identical to e-cigarettes are known by names like e-hookahs or vaping pens, thwarting efforts by health officials to track their use, especially among young people.

headline.main: E-Cigarettes, by Other Names, Lure Young and Worry Experts
headline.print_headline: E-Cigarettes, by Other Names, Lure Young and Worry Experts
